RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRISCO CANDY MAN cruised to wire. AGOUTIS SNOWPLOW game second. FIRST STOLI JUMPIN lost path early, late rally. ZOOMINGPRINCEZYDECO chased inside. TDZ TOAST TO BLUE widest of all. THREE R SWEET JESS three wide turn, no kick.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 250 Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 5600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JJ CORONAS SNOW fired, held. ROSE POOL bobbled start, sharp effort. CHLOES WILDONDAMONEY erratic, veered out late. GIAS MOLLY DOLLAR hopped start, chased. M CR PILOTOS false broke, hopped start. RH SWEET BIKINI fractious gate, no factor. STEWARDS INQUIRY INTO THE START OF THE RACE FOR M CR PILOTOS, AFTER A REVIEW STEWARDS DEAMED THAT HE WAS THE CAUSE OF HIS PROBLEMS.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 870 Y Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLETCH MY ALCOHOL much the best. KAS IM SLINKY hopped start, late rally. LOOSE STORIES chased, tired, held 3rd. PHANTOM POINT lost path early. ONE HECKUVA KISS inside turn, gaveway.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 350 Y Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 4300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAND KORONA fought gamely for win. SWEET MARY JEAN drift out, hard fought loss. JESA VALIANT HERO fired, drift in, weakened. TEE CAS even effort. THREE R GAME no excuses. DEUCES GONE ROGUE foe crossed path. MR ROCKY AFFAIR in tight early.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 220 Y Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 4000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRS STRAIGHT MONEY broke in, determined. EL REPRESENTANTE late kick, out nodded. FABULOUS MAMIE hard fought loss. AG LESPWA FE VIV close thru out.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 220 Y Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 11000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DYNASTY BLOOD all out. MS TURQUOISE steady drive for place. D FAST NOON PRIZE pressed, out kicked. JESSA LOUISIANA evenly. SHEZA LOUISIANA DOLL chased, no threat. SOUTH HENRY STREAK bumped, veered out. CARTERS BABY BLUES stumbled start, bumped.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 250 Y Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Purse 10000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAJUN TRAIN fired, best. CATCH YA LATER CHIC game second. TUFF GUY steady effort. MOON RAY B game effort. EYE ON DUECES late kick. MSM PARTY WITH MOE bumped, no menace. JM SOLEIL broke in, evenly. JJ CORONA JESS no factor. THE FISCAL FLYER fractious gate, broke in, bumped.
